stack.name: Jekyll
stack.text: Jekyll is a simple, blog aware, static site generator written in Ruby.

stack.name: HTML5
stack.text: HTML5 is a core technology markup language of the Internet used for structuring and presenting content for the World Wide Web.

stack.name: Sass
stack.text: Sass is the most mature, stable, and powerful professional grade CSS extension language in the world.

stack.name: Bourbon
stack.text: A simple and lightweight mixin library for Sass

stack.name: Neat
stack.text: A lightweight semantic grid framework for Sass and Bourbon.

stack.name: Bitters
stack.text: Scaffold styles, variables and structure for Bourbon projects.

stack.name: Vim
stack.text: Vim is a highly configurable text editor built to enable efficient text editing. It is an improved version of the vi editor distributed with most UNIX systems.

stack.name: Arch Linux
stack.text: Arch Linux is a general purpose GNU/Linux distribution versatile enough to suit any role. Development focuses on simplicity, minimalism, and code elegance.
